SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Order Product Adjustment Line Summary Fields

The Order Product Adjustment Line Item Summary object represents an adjustment to the price of an order product summary, usually a discount.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Order Product Adjustment Line Summary object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Adjustment	The amount, not including tax, of the adjustment associated with the order product adjustment line item summary.
Adjustment Cause	Indicates the promotions applied.
Adjustment with Tax	

The total amount, including tax, of the adjustment associated with the order product adjustment line item summary.

Adjustment with Tax = Adjustment + Tax


Description	The description of the order product adjustment line item summary.
Name	The name of the order product adjustment line item summary.
Order Adjustment Group Summary	The order adjustment group summary associated with the order product adjustment line item summary.
Order Product Summary	The order product summary associated with the order product adjustment line item summary.
Order Summary	The order summary associated with the order product adjustment line item summary.
Original Order Product Adjustment Line Item	

The original order product adjustment summary associated with the order product adjustment line item summary.

This field is blank for unmanaged orders.


Tax	The sum of all the tax lines associated with adjustment.

title: Understanding Order Product Adjustment Line Summary in Salesforce
